JobDispatcher Class Reference

Dispatch packet jobs to processor(s), takes care of packet cache, and send the reply back to the originator. More...

Detailed Description

Dispatch packet jobs to processor(s), takes care of packet cache, and send the reply back to the originator.

Member Function Documentation

bool JobDispatcher::checkCache (  Packet *  packet,
JobReply &  reply
)  [protected]
 

Check in packet cache for cached packages.

Parameters:
packet The packet to find in cache.
reply Will be filled in with the cached reply.
Returns:
true if the package was cached and the reply is filled with the cached answer.

virtual void JobDispatcher::dispatch (  Packet *  packet  )  [pure virtual]
 

Dispatch a packet to processor(s).

Implemented in MultiJobDispatcher, and SingleJobDispatcher.

virtual void JobDispatcher::dispatchDirect (  Packet *  packet  )  [pure virtual]
 

Dispatch a packet directly to processor(s) without handling various pre and post processing.

This should only be used by very special packages, such as the "periodic" package. The reply packet for these will not be sent.

Implemented in MultiJobDispatcher, and SingleJobDispatcher.

void JobDispatcher::sendReply (  JobReply &  reply,
bool  cache = true
)  [protected]
 

Send the reply to the packet originator and add it to cache.

Parameters:
reply The reply to send.
cache Whether or not to add it to cache ( although the cache might not accept it.) .
